trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of parameters relevant to an <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> as well as their respective mappings to columns in a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示与相关的参数集合<xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref>以及到中的列及其相应映射<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The number of parameters in the collection must equal the number of parameter placeholders within the command text, otherwise the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB might raise an error.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的参数的数量必须等于命令文本中的参数占位符的个数，否则 OLE DB.NET Framework 数据提供程序可能会引发错误。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> to add to the collection.
The index of the new <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> object.
The specified in the value parameter is already added to this or another .
trans-unit.target: 中指定 value 参数已添加到这个或其他 。

trans-unit.source: The value parameter is null.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> object to the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>.
A <xref:System.Object>.
The index of the new <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 新的索引<xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref>集合中的对象。

trans-unit.source: Adds an <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>, given the parameter name and data type.
trans-unit.target: 将添加<xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref>到<xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"> </xref>，给定的参数名称和数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType"></xref> values.
The index of the new <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> object.
Adds an <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref> given the parameter name and value.
trans-unit.target: 将添加<xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref>到<xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>给定参数名称和值。

trans-unit.source: Use caution when using this overload of the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection.Add%2A> method to specify integer parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 使用此重载时要格外小心<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection.Add%2A>方法，以指定整数参数值。</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because this overload takes a `value` of type <xref:System.Object>, you must convert the value to an <xref:System.Object> type when the value is zero, as the following C# example demonstrates.
trans-unit.target: 因为此重载接受`value`类型的<xref:System.Object>，你必须将值转换为<xref:System.Object>键入时的值为零，如下面的 C# 示例所示。</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: ``` parameters.Add("@pname", Convert.ToInt32(0)); ``` If you do not perform this conversion, the compiler will assume you are attempting to call the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection.Add%2A> overload.
trans-unit.target: ``` parameters.Add("@pname", Convert.ToInt32(0)); ```如果不执行此转换，则编译器将假定你尝试调用<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection.Add%2A>重载。</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection.Add%2A>
